title: Fate- The Future Stealer
body:
Fate
- The Future Stealer

HP 447 + 71 2.2/5sec +2.7
MP 480 + 104 3.7/5sec + 2.2
AD 57 + 3.4
Atk Speed 0.701 + 0.014
Armor 22 + 2.1
MR 26 + 1.8
Speed 345


Passive: Your Future, My Past
Your Future: All enemies killed within 4000/6000/8000 units of Fate are marked for 3/4/5/6 minutes after they respawn.
During these minutes, Based on their movement, where they are estimated to be in 4 seconds are shown to all allies.

My Past: Fate sees another RED healthbar on the oppoenent, this is what their health will be in 5 seconds and will increase or reduce based on whether they take damage
or not. This healthbar will be involved in Fate's Abilities.

EXAMPLE, Taking 50 Damage will reduce both their green health and RED HEALTH by 50.
If u pause the regeneration of RED HEALTH, it will still go down when they get hit, BUT after 5 seconds, the green health will recover to the RED AMOUNT.


Q- Future's Edge 70/80/90/100/110 MP 17/15/13/11/9 seconds after the knife hits.
Fate selects a unit and throws a knife that blinks into a wormhole after travelling for 225 units. 
If it is blocked, it will deal 30/50/70/90/110 +40%AD Instant damage.
However, if it is not blocked and manages to phase into the wormhole the targeted enemy becomes marked and the knife will strike them in 5 seconds.
Once marked, every 1% MAX RED HEALTH reduced from them will increase the damage of the thrown Knife by 
4/6/10/18/34 + 2% AD + 1% AP.
Knife deals 20/45/70/95/120 +60%AD + 30%AP

**** IF YOU ARE CONFUSED****
1. Knife is thrown
2. Enters wormhole
3. Marks enemy
4. Cuts down RED HEALTH BAR and begins counting % Reduction in RED HEALTH BAR and starts to calculate damage until 5 seconds.
5. Knife strikes the Enemy, converting their GREEN HEALTH to their RED HEALTH amount and applying base + BONUS damage from reducing their RED HEALTH BAR.
6. They either get rekt cos you hit them, or take barely any damage.




W- My Game  100MP 30/29/28/27/26 seconds.
Fate draws a movement path with the next movement command, up to 2000/3000/4000/5000/6000 units away, after 3 seconds of the drawn path, the path will reveal
all gadgets ( Not champions, turrets, or minions) that would cause him to be seen by the enemies if he walks the path.
If the path predicts no gadgets, walking on the path grants 30/40/50/60/70% Movement speed, 10/20/30/40/50% Tenacity and 100% Slow resistance.
Path lasts 20 seconds.


E- My Future is Now. 150 MP. 54/51/48/45/42 seconds.
Upon activation, Fate instantly regenerates 110/120/130/140/150% of all mana and health he would have regenerated on the next 25 seconds.

And for 5 seconds, all spell cooldowns go down at a faster rate of 1.5/2/2.5/3/3.5 seconds per 1 seconds.
However there is a cost, for 20/19/18/17/16 seconds after, he will not regenerate any health or mana and all spell cooldowns go down 50% Slower.



R- Your future, is no more. 100MP 120/100/80 seconds.
Fate Channels for 3 seconds, after that, all enemies have their available abilities, items and summonerspells revealed next to/ on top of them.
As well as that, Fate merges their Future with their current timeline, causing them to take 10/15/20% More RED HEALTH damage ( They take 10/15/20% of 
the damage they take NOW as DoT True Damage over 5 seconds to match up to their Damaged RED HEALTH.)



No one decides Fate's Fate.


Steps to winning a trade against a Melee champ.

Step 1, they run up to you.
Step 2, Fate uses Q
Step 3, Fate hits them to increase damage of Q.
Optional Step 4: Uses E to regenerate health and nuke them with MORE Q to deal even more damage.


Steps to winning trade against RANGED champions.

Step 1: You cant hit them cos they too far away.
Step 2: Use Q
Step 3: Use E to heal and hit with more Q.
Step 4: Hope for the best since you can barely proc Q passive many times and maybe you wont run out of Mana.
